Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: Not sure what to watch next? Then discover some of the greatest British Sky Originals. From Four Kids and It to SAS Red Notice, there's something here for everyone.

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: Comedy starring Paul Rudd and Jason Segel. When real-estate developer Peter Klaven asks his fiancée Zooey to marry him, everything seems idyllic. But as their wedding day is organised, it soon becomes apparent that Peter has no close male friends, and therefore no best man. So when he strikes up a friendship with straight-talking Sydney Fife, his dilemma seems to be solved. However, his "bromance" with Sydney starts to impact on the relationship with his soon-to-be wife John Hamburg - Director Paul Rudd - Peter Klaven Jason Segel - Sydney Fife Rashida Jones - Zooey Andy Samberg - Robbie J K Simmons - Oz Jane Curtin - Joyce Jon Favreau - Barry Jaime Pressly - Denise Rob Huebel - Tevin Downey Thomas Lennon (3) - Doug.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Robert De Niro and Ben Stiller. Following her engagement to male nurse Greg Focker, Pam Byrnes and her family decamp to Florida to check out the prospective in-laws. programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Seth Rogen and Katherine Heigl. Alison Scott's career as a television journalist is going from strength to strength. programme.title: The Commuter

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. This ultimately leads her back to her mother and her former sidekicks, who join forces against those who took everything from them. Action thriller, starring Karen Gillan and Lena Headey Navot Papushado - Director Karen Gillan - Sam Lena Headey - Scarlet Carla Gugino - Madeleine Michelle Yeoh - Florence Angela Bassett - Anna May Chloe Coleman - Emily Paul Giamatti - Nathan.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Maggie Grace and Toby Kebbell. With a category five hurricane bearing down on an Alabama town, an opportunistic group of crooks use the meteorological mayhem as cover for an audacious raid on a US Treasury facility. However, standing in the criminals' way are a maverick ATF agent and a stormchaser with a tragic past Rob Cohen - Director Maggie Grace - Casey Toby Kebbell - Will Ryan Kwanten - Breeze Ralph Ineson - Perkins Melissa Bolona - Sasha Ben Cross - Dixon Jamie Andrew Cutler - Clement Rice.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Period epic starring Russell Crowe and Joaquin Phoenix. Rome, the second century AD: dying emperor Marcus Aurelius chooses the city's beloved general, Maximus Decimus Meridius, as his successor - a decision that results in a bitter power struggle with Aurelius's son Commodus, who sentences Maximus and his family to death. programme.title: Dutch F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader. (27.08).

programme.title: F1 Demystified: Dashboards
programme.desc: What do all the numbers on an F1 steering wheel mean? Ted Kravitz is on hand to explain all.

programme.title: Italian F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago. (03.09).

programme.desc: Natalie Pinkham and Karun Chandhok head to the Venetian hotel in Las Vegas to take on the gondolas with Alpine pair Pierre Gasly and Esteban Ocon.

programme.title: Singapore F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. Carlos Sainz starts from pole position and George Russell joins him on the front row. (17.09).

programme.title: Japanese F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2023 Japanese Grand Prix starts here. Ahead of the McLarens, Max Verstappen returned to his imperious best to lock in pole. His Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez starts from P5. (24.09).

programme.title: Jess Hawkins Makes History

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On the front row, pole-sitter Sergio Perez is joined by Fernando Alonso as George Russell completes the top three for the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix. Max Verstappen starts from P15. (19.03).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix has arrived as Baku prepares for 51 laps of high-octane racing. Charles Leclerc's immense one-lap pace in Friday's qualifying secured Ferrari pole. (30.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The wait is over - it's Formula 1 race day at the Miami International Autodrome in Florida. Sergio Perez starts on pole with Fernando Alonso also on the front row. (07.05).

programme.title: Live NCAA Basketball
programme.desc: The North Carolina Tar Heels compete with the Clemson Tigers in an NCAA men's college basketball matchup. (07.02).

programme.title: SA20 Q1: Sunrisers v Duban Hlts
programme.desc: Sunrisers Eastern Cape and Durban's Super Giants do battle in the opening SA20 Qualifier. The winner advances to the final, while the loser will face the winner of the Eliminator. (06.02).

programme.title: Women's Asian Amatuer C'ship Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth day of the Women's Asia-Pacific Amateur Golf Championship. Siam Country Club in Thailand stages the sixth edition of the competition previously won by Eila Galitsky. (04.02).

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final round at the returning Bahrain Championship, taking place at the Royal Golf Club. Dylan Frittelli takes a two-shot lead into trophy day here in the Kingdom. (04.02).

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Arsenal
programme.desc: Enjoy the best Premier League goals scored by Arsenal over the years, including strikes by club legends Thierry Henry, Dennis Bergkamp and more.

programme.title: Women's Asian Amatuer C'ship Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth day of the Women's Asia-Pacific Amateur Golf Championship. Siam Country Club in Thailand stages the sixth edition of the competition previously won by Eila Galitsky. (04.02).

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v AUS 2010
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's victorious 2010 final against old rivals Australia.

programme.title: ICC Women's WC: ENG v IND 2017
programme.desc: Revisit the final of the 2017 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup, as England - hosts of the tournament - clashed with 2005 runners-up India at Lord's. England were targeting title number four.

programme.title: SA20 Paarl R v Sunrisers EC Hlts
programme.desc: Paarl Royals clash with Sunrisers Eastern Cape in the SA20. (02.02).

programme.title: Phoenix Open 2018 Highlights
programme.desc: The best of the action from the Waste Management Phoenix Open in Scottsdale, Arizona. Hideki Matsuyama comes into this event looking for his third consecutive title.

programme.title: Netball Quad Series
programme.desc: England meet Australia in the final of the 2024 Netball Nations Cup at the First Direct Arena in Leeds. England's 58-57 win over New Zealand creates a repeat of last year's final. (28.01).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, one of eight PGA Tour Signature Events this season, taking place across two iconic courses - Pebble Beach and Spyglass Hill.

programme.title: ICC Women's WC: WI v AUS 2013
programme.desc: At the 2013 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup in India, the West Indies went toe to toe with Australia in the final. A sixth World Cup title was up for grabs for the Aussies.

programme.title: ICC Women's WC: ENG v AUS 2017
programme.desc: At the 2017 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup in England, the hosts would meet Australia in the fifth round of group stage matches.

programme.title: Pushing Boundaries: Lights Camera
programme.desc: Action! Kate Cross charts the history of women's cricket via pioneers like Rachael Heyhoe-Flint and Charlotte Edwards, from the first match in 1745 to the Hundred.

programme.title: SA20 Q1: Sunrisers v Duban Hlts
programme.desc: Sunrisers Eastern Cape and Durban's Super Giants do battle in the opening SA20 Qualifier. The winner advances to the final, while the loser will face the winner of the Eliminator. (06.02).

programme.title: Premier League Years
programme.desc: Revisit the annals of Premier League history with the 2022-2023 season, a campaign that saw Manchester City and Pep Guardiola rewrite what is possible in English club football.

programme.title: Super League '23 Season Rewind
programme.desc: Newly rebranded Leigh Leopards mark their return to the top flight by taking on Paul Rowley's Red Devils. How will Adrian Lam's side fare in their fourth season of Super League? (17.02).

programme.title: Bundesliga Legends: Mario Gomez
programme.desc: Renowned for a clinical edge few strikers possessed during his time, revisit a selection of goals from one of the Bundesliga's greats - Mario Gomez.

programme.title: Live B'Liga: Mainz v Union Berlin
programme.desc: Mainz and Union Berlin meet in a match from the German Bundesliga. Neither team managed to pick up a point in their previous match. (07.02).

programme.title: The Open Official Film: Lowry 2019
programme.desc: The Official Film of The 2019 Open Championship at Royal Portrush Golf Club in Northern Ireland. It was to be a memorable first Major win for an Irish golfer.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, one of eight PGA Tour Signature Events this season, taking place across two iconic courses - Pebble Beach and Spyglass Hill.

programme.title: PL Greatest: L'Pool/Blackpool 2010
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Blackpool, the 2-1 win at Anfield against Liverpool in October 2010.

programme.title: SA20 Eliminator: Paarl v Joburg
